dataset_info.focus: Sensor Spoofing, Injection, and Manipulation Attacks

data_injection_low.description: Attacker injecting false LOW moisture readings to waste water
data_injection_low.motivation: Waste water resources, increase irrigation costs

data_injection_high.description: Attacker injecting false HIGH moisture to prevent irrigation

sensor_spoofing_replay.description: Replay attack - sending old sensor readings
sensor_spoofing_replay.motivation: Hide actual field conditions, prevent proper irrigation

man_in_the_middle_modify.description: MITM attack modifying sensor data in transit
man_in_the_middle_modify.attack_vector: Intercept and modify packets between sensor and gateway

protocol_exploitation.attack_vector: Buffer overflow, command injection on IoT protocol

dos_sensor_jamming.description: Denial of Service - sensor readings stuck/frozen
